attractions.name: IFS太古里
attractions.reason: Modern shopping area with traditional architecture blend, free to explore

attractions.name: 春熙路
attractions.reason: Famous shopping street, adjacent to Taikoo Li

attractions.name: 成都大熊猫繁育研究基地 (Panda Base)
attractions.address: 成华区外北熊猫大道1375号
attractions.reason: Must-visit attraction in Chengdu, see giant pandas
attractions.tips: Arrive early (before 9am) when pandas are most active

attractions.name: 锦里古街 (Jinli Ancient Street)
attractions.address: 武侯区武侯祠大街231号附1号
attractions.reason: Traditional architecture street, adjacent to Wuhou Temple, free entry

attractions.name: 宽窄巷子 (Kuanzhai Alley)
attractions.address: 青羊区金河路口宽窄巷子
attractions.reason: Historic cultural street, traditional Chengdu architecture, free entry

attractions.name: 文殊院 (Wenshu Temple)
attractions.reason: Beautiful Buddhist temple, peaceful atmosphere, free entry

notes: Panda Base and Wuhou Temple require tickets, other attractions are free. Prices per person.
